properties.name: Volcanoes National Park: Teresa's Favorite Lava Flow
properties.description: Posted by Savjwriter Pele emptied her lava into the sea at the end of Craters Road when I visited years ago. Leave the sandals at home, and carry a heavy stick to knock the ground. Best to find the soft spots with the stick before you step through into the flowing lava.

properties.name: Volcanoes National Park: Teresa's Favorite Star Gazing
properties.description: Posted by Savjwriter Volcanoes National Park is remote and unburdened with a lot of foliage. Nothing but crusty black lava below and the black sky above -- perfect for stars. I\'ve never seen so many. I didn\'t know there were so many. I slept in a truck on a landscape remniscient of the moon.
